_header: Jesu Christ of mights most / Father and son and holy ghost
Subjects: All Saints’, feast of; All Souls’ Day
_description: The Founding of the Feasts of All Saints and All Souls

BodAsh61.First Lines:
Ihesu cryst of myȝhtes mostfader & sone & holy
                    gostBe At ouer be gynnengAnd saue mans kynd fro
                    spyllyng…
BodAsh61.Last Lines:
…Wyth gode hert þat it so beSey we Amen for
                    charyte
BodAsh61.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Nachträge zu den Legenden 5: The Messengers of Death.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         79 (1887): 411-70: 435.
Shuffleton,  George. 
             Ashmole 61: A Compilation of Popular Middle English Verse.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008: 198-211; 496-500; 609-10.
